categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Rand Nalleck was a cadet at the Galactic Empire Imperial Academy of Carida, located on the planet Carida. Nalleck joined the academy during the year 5 BBY, and graduated in 1 BBY. During the graduation ceremony, which was overseen by General Rom Mohc, Nalleck's name was called out by the general to receive a special award.

Rand Nalleck was first mentioned in the audio adaption of the novella Dark Forces: Soldier for the Empire, which was released in 1997. As the character's name is only given in spoken dialogue from the audio adaption, the actual spelling of the character's name cannot be determined.
